metadata.title: CVE-2023-50781 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in m2crypto. This issue may allow a remote attacker todecrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSA key exchanges, whichmay lead to exposure of confidential or sensitive data.

criterions.comment: m2crypto package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
